channel.title: Optic-Pkz
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i805.photobucket.com/albums/yy335/ExionGFX/Optic-Pkz/optic-pkz.png[/img][/center]
[b]Don't need this anymore, so here you guys go. Mainly because the latest version was wiped off of my webhost, and I lost it. No anti-leech. [/b]
[b]Some Features:[/b]
[ul][li]PK Point Shop[/li] [li]PK Point System[/li] [li]Anti-PK Point Farming[/li] [li]Multi/Non-Multi Areas[/li] [li]Webclient Ready[/li][/ul]
[b]Media:[/b] [img]http://i805.photobucket.com/albums/yy335/ExionGFX/Optic-Pkz/home.jpg[/img] [img]http://i805.photobucket.com/albums/yy335/ExionGFX/Optic-Pkz/pkexchange.jpg[/img] [img]http://i805.photobucket.com/albums/yy335/ExionGFX/Optic-Pkz/bolts.jpg[/img] [img]http://i805.photobucket.com/albums/yy335/ExionGFX/Optic-Pkz/claws.jpg[/img]
[b]Download:[/b]
[ul][li][b]Source + Client/Webclient Files: [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?nxkc9p5qf19m665]Mediafire[/b][/li][/ul]

item.description:
@xEvo wrote:

People still use this? Lol…

[quote=“pr0 0wnage, post:75, topic:367904”]well i downloaded it but can you tell me how to like make it start, when i start client when i log in it says error connecting to server, also webclient says error while loading, restarting in 10-9-8… then all over again help please?
contact me through my youtube account killerWAR101[/quote]
Change the IP in client.java, and make sure to upload the cache to your filehost.

item.title: Optic-Pkz
item.dc:creator: @darknessxd darknessxd
item.description:
@darknessxd wrote:

uhm ok so ive managed fixing the wildy so its not wildy all over just outside of the home spot

but heres a few questions

im still trying to decrease the levels from like lvl 42-46 to lvls like 18-22 and i wanted to add a multi pk zone which i have but it says it is wildy lvl -3 uhm ??? help please

edit ok so this is the code i have trying to make multi pk zone

public boolean inWild() {
if(absX > 2607 && absX < 2595 && absY > 4780 && absY < 4768 || absX > 2524 && absX < 2567 && absY > 3847 && absY < 3889) {
return true;
}
return false;
}
here is the code i have under inpvp boolean

public boolean inPVP() {
if(absX >= 2607 && absX <= 2595 && absY >= 4780 && absY <= 4768 || absX > 2524 && absX < 2567 && absY > 3847 && absY < 3889) {
return true;
}
return false;
}

then this is the code i have added under the inmulti boolean

public boolean inMulti() {
if((absX >= 2607 && absX <= 2595 && absY >= 4780 && absY <= 4768) ||
(absX >= 3190 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3648 && absY <= 3839) ||
(absX >= 3200 && absX <= 3390 && absY >= 3840 && absY <= 3967) ||
(absX >= 2992 && absX <= 3007 && absY >= 3912 && absY <= 3967) ||
(absX >= 2946 && absX <= 2959 && absY >= 3816 && absY <= 3831) ||
(absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3199 && absY >= 3856 && absY <= 3903) ||
(absX >= 3008 && absX <= 3071 && absY >= 3600 && absY <= 3711) ||
(absX >= 3072 && absX <= 3327 && absY >= 3608 && absY <= 3647) ||
(absX >= 2624 && absX <= 2690 && absY >= 2550 && absY <= 2619) ||
(absX >= 2371 && absX <= 2422 && absY >= 5062 && absY <= 5117) ||
(absX >= 2896 && absX <= 2927 && absY >= 3595 && absY <= 3630) ||
(absX >= 2892 && absX <= 2932 && absY >= 4435 && absY <= 4464) ||
(absX >= 2256 && absX <= 2287 && absY >= 4680 && absY <= 4711) ||
(absX >= 2572 && absX <= 2584 && absY >= 9887 && absY <= 9889) ||
(absX > 2607 && absX < 2595 && absY > 4780 && absY < 4768)) {

		return true;
	}
	return false;
}

the coords to the new multi pk spot im trying to add are x: 2607 y: 4780 , and x: 2595 y: 4787

so can you help me because whatever im doing is not creating a new pvp area infact its not doing nothing

Read full topic
